0.title: Disaster response and recovery costs; authorize transfer to disaster trust fund.
0.description: An Act To Direct The State Fiscal Officer To Transfer A Certain Sum From The Motor Vehicle Ad Valorem Tax Reduction Fund To The Disaster Assistance Trust Fund; And For Related Purposes.

1.title: Extend sympathy and prayers to victims of Louisville tornado on April 28, 2014.
1.description: A Resolution Extending Sympathy And Prayers To The Victims Of The Violent Tornado That Struck Louisville And Winston County, Mississippi, On April 28, 2014.

2.title: Extend condolences to surviving family of Ruth Bennett who died saving the life of a child at her Childcare Center.
2.description: A Resolution Extending The Thanks And Condolences Of The Senate To The Surviving Family Of Louisville Childcare Operator Ruth Bennett Who Saved The Life Of A Child Under Her Care During The Violent Tornado Of Monday, April 28, 2014.
